author: vg247.com - Mark Warren
title: Wahey, Fallout 4's next-gen update is finally set to arrive later this month | Flipboard
text: Wahey, Fallout 4's next-gen update is finally set to arrive later this month Boo! After eons of silence, Bethesda has finally provided us with an update on Fallout 4's long-awaited next-gen update. It's coming later this month … Related articles More stories from [Fallout 4](/topic/fallout4) [Fallout Cascadia trailer drops, looks like the best Fallout in a long time](/topic/fallout4/fallout-cascadia-trailer-drops-looks-like-the-best-fallout-in-a-long-time/a-HUPxLFNRQgOSftMbeu96Pg%3Aa%3A3564342025-75e2dadb52%2Fgamingbible.com) We can never get enough of the post-apocalyptic wasteland that Bethesda’s iconic Fallout series has to offer.
